analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika citta samuṭṭhāna duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha
